user.Active Users: Total number of users who actively engaged with the learning platform
user.Signups: Number of new user registrations during this period

usage.Platform: Overall platform usage metrics and engagement statistics
usage.Courses: Usage statistics specifically related to course activities
usage.Library: Usage statistics for library and resource access

course.Assigned Courses: Number of courses assigned to learners during this period
course.Passed Courses: Number of learners who achieved a passing score in courses
course.Completed Courses: Number of learners who finished all course components
